inputs.selection_motivation: SMB Cloud Spend directly drives demand for AI infrastructure services as small and medium businesses adopt AI workloads, making it a major influence on AI infrastructure growth.
inputs.candidate_motivation: SMB Cloud Spend is influenced by cloud infrastructure demand, data center capacity, and macroeconomic conditions affecting SMB IT budgets; the shortlisted topics represent direct cloud infrastructure players, data-center expansion, and relevant inflation/macroeconomic signals.
